tourSpots.title: Ginza – Shopping District
tourSpots.description: Some of the finest Japanese and international fashion and luxury goods can be bought at Tokyo's Ginza shopping area – center city.

tourSpots.title: Odaiba – Hot Springs
tourSpots.description: After a long morning of shopping head over the Rainbow Bridge where you'll have a selection of hot springs to spend the afternoon relaxing.

tourSpots.title: Shibuya – Night Life
tourSpots.description: Refreshed and relaxed it's time to play, Shibuya is on place to consider. Bars and restaurants open until late in the morning.
